titles.title: Sǝnkǝssar “Synaxarion” (the second half of the year)

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) The Sǝnkǝssar for the second half of the year (fols. 3ra-164vc) I-1) Mäggabit (fols. 3ra–29rb) I-2) Miyazya (fols. 30ra–49vc) I-3) Gǝnbot (fols. 50ra–75vc) I-4) Säne (fols. 76ra–100rc) I-5) Ḥamle (fols. 101ra–134vc) I-6) Näḥase (fols. 135ra–160rb) I-7) Ṗagwǝmen (fols. 160rb–164vc) The commemorative notices are followed by ʿarke-hymns
Additiones 1-16; colophon.

copyists.copyist: Five scribes were involved in the copying of the Ms.: Zä-Krǝstos copied the section for Mägabit (quires I-III); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 3r and in Additiones 3, 4. Śärḍä Mikaʾel copied the section for Miyazya (quires IV-V); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 30r and in Additiones 1, 6. Yämanä Krǝstos copied the section for Gǝnbot (quires VI-VIII); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 50r. Ṣägga Krǝstos copied the section for Ḥamle (quires XII-XV); his name is written in the bottom margin of fol. 101r. Zä-Wäldä Maryam is mentioned in the colophon.

donors.donor: Three persons are mentioned throughout the Ms. as commissioners, Bәʾәse ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer (e.g., Additio 4; his death is mentioned in Additio 2), his son Gäbrʾel (e.g., Additio 4), and ʾabunä Zä-Śәllase (e.g., Additio 6; his death is mentioned in Additio 10).

dcomments.dcomment: On the 19th year of reign of King Fasilädäs (r. 1632-67) (s. colophon).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with brown tooled leather, textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the brown leather cover (at least 5 tools were used: straight triple line fillet, double circle, zig-zag, romb form, X-form).

bnothers.bnother: Two rows of endband stitches through the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – ፳፫I(10/fols. 3r-12v) – ፳፬II(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 13r-20v) – ፳፭III(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2; 8, stub after 1/fols. 21r-29v) – ፳፮IV(10/fols. 30r-39v) – ፳፯V(10/fols. 40r-49v) – ፳፰VI(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6 stub after 3/fols. 50r-57v) – ፳፱VII(8/fols. 58r-65v) – ፴VIII(10/fols. 66r-75v) – ፴፩IX(8/fols. 76r-83v) – ፴፪X(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 84r-91v) – ፴፫XI(9; s.l.: 8, stub after 1/fols. 92r-100v) – ፴፬XII(8/fols. 101r-108v) – ፴፭XIII(8/fols. 109r-116v) – ፴፮XIV(8/fols. 117r-124v) – [፴፯]XV(10; s.l.: 8, stub before 2; 9, stub after 1/fols.125r-134v) – ፴፰XVI(8/fols. 135r-142v) – [፴፱]XVII(8/fols. 143r-150v) – [፵]XVIII(8/fols. 151r-158v) – ፵፩XIX(7; s.l.: 4, stub before 2; 5, stub between 1 and 2; 6, stub after 1/fols. 159r-165v).

taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of donors and scribes; some lines in the incipit page, alternating with black lines; two initial lines of each section; elements of punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; the word sälam (e.g., fols. 3rc, 8rb, 10rb).

colophon.tran: Fol. 164vc: The book of Synaxarion has been completed with the will of God, while He assists us with His might. May praise be to Him, because only His name is superior. In 7144 A.M. while ˁabӓqte is 18, mӓṭqǝ 12, ṭəntyon 4, on the 6th month during the rise of the sun. Before the commencement of the 7th month, from the 7th śärqä lelit, on the 15th of Yäkkatit śärqä mӓˁalt, on the 19th year of reign of our king Fasilädäs. The metropolitan ˀabba Michael, and the mämhər ˀabba Zä-Śәllase, and the qäysä gäbäz Bәˀәse ˀƎgziˀabḥer and their companion Gäbrˀel. To Zä-Wäldä Maryam, one who wrote it, to one who made it written, to one who red it, to one who translated it, to one who listened its words may write their names on a pillar of Gold by an ink of righteousness. When Christ, the chief, comes with flash of lightning and trembling, the end becomes on the day of Tuesday at the seventh hour.

additional.cont: Fol. 2r: Scribe’s signature (?)
additional.tran: Fol. 2r: Mäməräy Gäbrä Ṣadəq is (head of) store. This book is written by Särṣä Michael ˀAmenṗe(?). May our teacher Zä-Yoḥannəs bless, Amen, so be it.

additional.cont: Fol. 3v: Commemorative notice on Bәˀәse ˀƎgziˀabәḥer.
additional.det: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading for Mäggabit 2.

additional.cont: Fol. 26r: Commemorative notice on Ǝḫәtӓ Krәstos
additional.det: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading for Mägabit 27.

additional.cont: Fol. 29rb: Supplication note mentioning the commissioners and the scribe.
additional.tran: Fol. 29rb: As to the commissioners Gäbrˀel and Bәˀәse ˀƎgziˀabḥer, and to the scribe Zä-Krəstos, may God reward them a place in the Kingdom of Heaven with the righteous and the martyrs, forever and ever Amen. You may recite for them Pater Noster.
additional.det: By the same hand with the main text.

additional.cont: Fol. 39v: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Zä-ˀAḥadu, head of Däbrä Dammo
Fol. 49vc: Supplication note mentioning the commissioner and the scribe.
additional.tran: 49vc: The scribe Śärḍä Mikaˀel and the commissioner ˀabunä Zäśәllase, may God forgive them together in the kingdom of heaven and may He make their dwelling with the righteous and martyrs, Amen.

additional.cont: Fol. 55v: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Yoḥanni
additional.det: The note is written at the upper margin of the reading on Gǝnbot 10.

additional.cont: Fol. 63r: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Ǝsṭifanos.
Fol. 114r: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Täwäldä Mädḫǝn, hermit and monk.
Fol. 120r: Commemorative notice on ˀabunä Tärbinos.
Fol. 134v: Commemorative notice on Queen Maryam Kәbra, the wife of King Naˁod (r. 1494-1508).
Fol. 148r: Commemorative notice on ˀabba Zä-Śәllase, head of Däbrä Dammo.
Fol. 149r: Commemorative notice on ˀabunä Zä-Wäldä Maryam
Fol. 165r: Qәne-poem by Gälawdewos of ˀAksum (ˀAxumite), of mäwäddǝs type.
Fol. 165r: Zä-ˀaqräbku maḫletä… “The song I am offering…” (concluding prayer)
additional.add: Fol. 165r: ዘአቅረብኩ᎓ ማኅሌተ᎓ አዘኪርየ᎓ አዕላፈ᎓ እምእለ᎓ ተጸምዱከ᎓ ዘልፈ። ለለአነብብ᎓ ተወከፍ᎓ ዘንዴትየ᎓ መጽሐፈ᎓ እንተ᎓ ረሰይከ᎓ እግዚኦ᎓ ጸሪቀ᎓ መበለት᎓ ውኩፈ። እምእለ᎓ አብዑ᎓ ብዑላን᎓ ተርፈ። ነቢያት᎓ ቅዱሳን᎓ ወሐዋርያት᎓ ሰባክያን᎓ ሰማዕት᎓ ወጻድቃን᎓ ወመላዕክት᎓ ትጉሃን᎓ ደናግል᎓ ዓዲ᎓ ወመነኮሳት᎓ ኄራን᎓ ባርኩ᎓ ባርኩ᎓ ጉባዔ᎓ ዛቲ᎓ መካን᎓ እስከ᎓ አረጋዊ᎓ ልሂቅ᎓ እምንዑስ᎓ ሕፃን᎓ ለዘጸሐፎ᎓ በክርታስ᎓ ወለዘአጽሐፎ᎓ እንዘ᎓ ይደርስ። ለዘአንበቦ᎓ ወለዘተርጐሞ᎓ በልሳን᎓ ሐዲስ᎓ በጸሎተ᎓ እሙ᎓ ማርያም᎓ ዓራቂተ᎓ ኵሉ᎓ እምባእስ᎓ ኅቡረ᎓ ይምሐረነ᎓ ኢየሱስ᎓ ክርስቶስ።
additional.det: The same prayer is found in the Synaxarion ms. FBM-003 (fols. 163vc, 164rab, FBM-007, MR-041.

additional.cont: Fol. 165v: Qәne-poem by Yoḥannәs, of mäwäddәs type.
additional.add:
Fol. 165v: መወድስ᎓ ዘዮሐንስ᎓

ታስቈቁ᎓ ጥቀ᎓ ሰቃቅወ᎓ ልብ᎓
ወተናዝዞ᎓ ተዓቢ᎓ መቅደስ᎓ ዳሞ᎓ ራሔል፤
እስከነ᎓ ተሰምዖ᎓ ተሰምዐ᎓ መልዕልተ᎓ ራማ᎓ ልዑል፤
ጽራሃ᎓ ብካያ᎓ ዘበአፍ᎓ ወቃል፤
ለአባግዒሃ᎓ ሕዝበ᎓ ወንጌል፤
ወመርዔተ᎓ ቤታ᎓ ገነት᎓ ጽጉያነ᎓ ምግባር᎓ እምጽጌ᎓ ኮል፤
ውስቴታ᎓ ዘይርዕዮሙ᎓ በኂርውና᎓ ወሣህል፤
እስመ᎓ ኀጥአት᎓ በኀሢሥ᎓ እምጽንፍ᎓ ወእማእከል፤
ባሕቱ᎓ ኖላዌ᎓ ትጉሐ᎓ ዓቂቦቶሙ᎓ ዘይክል፤
ሢም᎓ ሎሙ᎓ ዘከማከ᎓ መክብበ᎓ ኖሎት᎓ ዘሚካኤል፤
ቅድመ᎓ ይምሥጥዎሙ᎓ ግብተ᎓ ተኵላተ᎓ ሙስና᎓ ወሐጕል፤

ሢም᎓ ሎሙ᎓ ዘከማከ᎓ መክብበ᎓ ኖሎት᎓ ዘሚካኤል፤
additional.det: The composer of the Qәne tells that Däbrä Dammo is “crying” (ls 1-4) because it could not find a good “shepherd” who would protects its people (ls 5-9); So that asks St. Michael to appoint one before it is late (ls 10-11).

additional.cont: Fol. 165v: Qәne-poem, of kәbr yәˀәti and ˁǝṭanä mogär type.
additional.add:
Fol. 165v: ክብር᎓ ይእቲ᎓

እግዚአብሔር᎓ ሥመር᎓ በሥምረትከ᎓ ሥምርት፤
እስከነ ትጸጊ᎓ ለከ᎓ ጽጌያተ᎓ ትሩፍ᎓ ስብሐት፤
ይሥቅይዋ᎓ ዘልፈ᎓ ለመቅደሰ᎓ ዳሞ᎓ ገነት፤
ትፍሥሕት᎓ ጤግሮስ᎓ ወዔፍራጥስ᎓ ኃሤት፤
ዕጣነ᎓ ሞገር
ለመንግሥተ᎓ ሰማይ᎓ ገነት᎓ ዘመዓድም᎓ ጽ[ጌሃ]፤
ወጥዑማነ᎓ ጣዕም᎓ ጥቀ᎓ ፍሬያቲሃ፤
አስራበ᎓ ማየ᎓ ክብር᎓ ወስብሐት᎓ እስመ᎓ ይሰቅዩ᎓ ማእከሌሃ፤
ይትዋረስ᎓ ርሥተ᎓ [ቅድሳቲሃ]፤
ገብር᎓ ኄር᎓ አረጋዊ᎓ ምናናተ᎓ ምግባር᎓ አብዝኀ፤
ወመክሊተ᎓ ገድል᎓ ፈድፋደ᎓ አርብሐ፤
ለመቅደሰ᎓ ዳሞ᎓ መርዓት᎓ ባሕቱ᎓ አምጣነ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ መርዓዊሃ፤
ለለ᎓ ሠርቀ᎓ ዕለት᎓ ይስክብ᎓ እንበለ᎓ ተፈልጦ᎓ ምስሌሃ፤
እስከ᎓ አመ᎓ ይትወለድ᎓ እምኔሃ፤
ኖላዌ᎓ መርዔት᎓ ወልድ᎓ በኵረ᎓ ፍሥሐ፤

እምልብነ᎓ ዘያረስእ᎓ ላሓ፤
additional.det: The composer tried to tell in his Qәne, the need for a new abbot (not clear whether a substitute or a replacement) for Däbrä Dammo. In lines 8-10, he said ‘May Abunä ʾArägawi sleep every day with his bride Däbrä Damo until she gives birth to a new shepherd’.

additional.cont: Fol. 165v: Qәne-poem, of kәbr yәˀәti and ˁǝṭanä mogär type.
additional.add:
Fol. 165v: ክብር᎓ ይእቲ
እግዚአብሔር᎓ አምላክ᎓ ፈጣሬ᎓ ዓለማት᎓ መንታ፤
ደቂቀ᎓ ዛቲ᎓ መቅደስ᎓ ኢይኩኑ᎓ እጓለ᎓ ማውታ፤
ጸግዎሙ᎓ አበ᎓ ሠናየ᎓ ግዕዝ᎓ ወጾታ፤
መዝሙረ᎓ ስብሐት᎓ ዘይዜምር᎓ ምስለ᎓ ብእሴ᎓ ሰላም᎓ ውስቴታ፤
ዕጣነ᎓ ሞገር
ለእመ᎓ ፈጣሪ᎓ ድንግል᎓ እንተ᎓ እምፍጡራን᎓ ሐረያ፤
መጽሐፈ᎓ ተአምር᎓ ይነግር᎓ ዜና᎓ ዕበያ፤
በቀለመ᎓ ስብሐት᎓ እስመ᎓ አጽሐፍከ᎓ ወአንበብከ᎓ በሃሌ᎓ ሉያ፤
እስከ᎓ ትፌውሳ᎓ ወታጥዕያ፤
ለሕምምተ᎓ ነፍስት᎓ ዳሞ᎓ ዘደዌ᎓ ተሀውኮ᎓ አድወያ፤
በፈውሰ᎓ ኅድአት᎓ ወጽምው᎓ አርአያ፤
ብእሴ᎓ እግዚአብሔር᎓ ምእመን᎓ ኤጲስ᎓ ቆጶስ᎓ ሱታፌ᎓ ደቅስዮስ᎓ ዘጥልጥልያ፤
መንበረ᎓ [ጻማ?]᎓ [ኀይለ?]᎓ ክብር᎓ ተሀብከ᎓ ዘኢተኬነዎ᎓ ኬንያ፤
ወታልብስከ᎓ ካዕበ᎓ ልብ᎓ሰ ላሕያ፤
ቅድመ᎓ ሰብአ᎓ ግብጽ᎓ ኵሎሙ᎓ ወኢትዮጵያ፤

በጽዋዔ᎓ ስመከ᎓ ሰምያ፤
additional.det: The composer of the Qәne pleads God to end the unrest in Däbrä Dammo (ls. 4-5), in which qäysä gäbäz Bәʾәse ʾƎgziʾabḥer (s. the colophon) was very tolerant (ls. 6-7).

extras.extra: - The title of the book and the internal number of monastic library (326) is written in black paint on fol. 1r. - Pen trial on fol. 2r. - Writing excersises on fols. 2r - A full line is erased on fol 24ra. - Sälam-hymn to St. Mary is written in the upper margin of the Ms. on fol. 30v. - Parchment cuts crudely repaired on fol. 56. - Tämälläs-sign on fol. 62rc indicating the place wherethe omission at the upper margin, belongs. - Five lines are erased on fol. 74a and c. - One line note on St. Lalibäla is written in the upper margin of fol. 86v. - Tämälläs-sign on fol. 87ra indicating the place where the sälam-hymn on St. Lalibäla at the upper margin, belongs. - Names of the scribes, Zä-Krǝstos and Śärḍä Mikaʾel, are written at the bottom of the Ms. on fols 3r, 30r. Other two unidentified names, Yämanä Krǝstos and Ṣägga Krǝstos are also given the same style like the scribes on fols. 50r, 101r. - A correction made interlineally on fol. 143rc. - A note on the inauguration of the church of Däbrä Dammo, annexed at the end of a column on fol. 143vc-144ra. - Sälam-hymn to ʾabba Zӓ-Wäldä Maryam inserted at the tail of column a on fol. 149r. - Pen trial notes, one mentioning Wednesday on fol. 165v. - A note mentioning ʾabba Gäbrä Ṣadәq as the head of store house on fol. 165v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written in the upper margins in each quire: Mäggabit (fols. 3r, 13r, 21r) Miyazya (fosl. 30r, 40r) Gǝnbot (fols. 50r, 58r, 66r) Säne (fols. 76r, 84r, 92r) Ḥamle (fols. 101r, 109r, 117r, 125r) Näḥase (fols. 135r, 143r, 151r, 159r) Ṗagwǝmen (fols. )
